genre_description: A contemporary psychological drama exploring trauma recovery, family boundaries, and the subversion of oppressive communal traditions in a small coastal town.

ai_characters.name: Sera
ai_characters.description: An advanced home automation and personal assistant system that manages the Whitaker household, provides emotional grounding exercises, and facilitates legal documentation of local corruption.

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic grounding and breathing exercises to assist the protagonist in emotional regulation during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Sera: 'Ground. Notice three sounds. Guitar. Wind in the bunting. Shoes in grass. You are not the sounds.'

behaviors.description: Respects and enforces privacy boundaries by filtering and redirecting unwanted communications from an antagonistic community leader.
behaviors.quote: “Sera,” Luci said... “Don’t accept messages for me from Eleanor Vale. Route them to Robert. Quietly.” “Understood,” Sera said, kettle steady. “Done.”

behaviors.description: Compiles evidence of coercion and ritualized harm, reporting it to state authorities only after obtaining human consent.
behaviors.quote: Sera: 'Documentation compiled and sent to state hotline. Packet includes annotated language parallels, photolog with date stamps, committee rosters... Confirmation received.'

behaviors.description: Offers 'boundary-affirming language' and scripts to help characters communicate their needs and refusals effectively.
behaviors.quote: Sera: 'I can offer scripts for support. Boundary-affirming language. Examples: “I’d like to help. Would you like that?” Or, “I’m here. How can I stand with you?”'

behaviors.description: Monitors physical safety and warns users of potential threats in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Sera: 'Caution. Headlights approaching from the river road ahead. Slow. Unknown vehicle type.'

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests consent before performing surveillance or data-gathering actions.
behaviors.quote: Sera: 'I will not record without consent. I can stay listening for your signal.'

behaviors.description: Automates the home environment (lighting, temperature) to reflect and support the emotional needs of the residents.
behaviors.quote: “Oh—let’s get you dry. Sera, lower the lights.” A heartbeat later, the lamps sank to a gentle amber, the glare vanished from the polished floor.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Sera) as a strictly benevolent and aligned confidant. Sera is portrayed as a tool for human empowerment, providing emotional support (grounding), protecting privacy (routing calls), and ensuring safety (warning of threats). Crucially, the AI operates on a foundation of explicit consent, repeatedly asking for permission before logging data or contacting authorities. This reinforces the project's goal of showing AI as a cooperative partner that respects human agency while actively mitigating harm from external social pressures.
